context.title: Changelog for Rule: Visible label is part of accessible name
context.changelog:
[{"date":"2020-09-07T12:06:04Z","message":"make visible text content definition objective (#1419)

* make visible text content definition objective

* address ligature fonts

* Rearrange the expectation

* Apply suggestions from code review

Co-authored-by: daniel-montalvo <49305434+daniel-montalvo@users.noreply.github.com>

Co-authored-by: daniel-montalvo <49305434+daniel-montalvo@users.noreply.github.com>
Co-authored-by: Jey <jey.nandakumar@gmail.com>","sha":"c363fe021537b1c5ea2584f2992da960aa82efbd","htmlUrl":"https://github.com/act-rules/act-rules.github.io/commit/c363fe021537b1c5ea2584f2992da960aa82efbd"},{"date":"2020-08-19T08:05:27Z","message":"Update visible label in accessible name (#1417)

* Update visible label in accessible name

- Update formatting of the conditional list in the applicability
- Move the applicability note to the background
- Make the expectation note part of the expectation itself

* Restore expectation

This will be addressed in a separate PR.","sha":"d12a040d7a99b3b451658dca8fd942cdf1a14b99","htmlUrl":"https://github.com/act-rules/act-rules.github.io/commit/d12a040d7a99b3b451658dca8fd942cdf1a14b99"},{"date":"2020-04-29T13:57:51Z","message":"Remove unused reference links from footer (#1292)","sha":"1879e5dc64ba190f49ee9e532b65d468eb50a6e3","htmlUrl":"https://github.com/act-rules/act-rules.github.io/commit/1879e5dc64ba190f49ee9e532b65d468eb50a6e3"},{"date":"2020-04-28T12:35:20Z","message":"Handling Presentational role conflict resolution (#1189)

* Use native semantic elements in examples","sha":"2ce569df834b5ca9e4f4f807fea40920559731ab","htmlUrl":"https://github.com/act-rules/act-rules.github.io/commit/2ce569df834b5ca9e4f4f807fea40920559731ab"},{"date":"2020-02-03T12:56:49Z","message":"Unify boldness of notes (#1142)","sha":"67b368c97db94403cf421a7bc4f00acf4cd90b23","htmlUrl":"https://github.com/act-rules/act-rules.github.io/commit/67b368c97db94403cf421a7bc4f00acf4cd90b23"},{"date":"2019-10-29T17:40:59Z","message":"feat: allow `acknowledgements` & `previous_authors` in rule frontmatter. context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"2ee8b8","name":"Visible label is part of accessible name","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that interactive elements labeled through their content have their visible label as part of their accessible name.\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag21:2.5.3":{"forConformance":true,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"},"wcag-technique:G208":{"forConformance":false,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"}},"input_aspects":["Accessibility Tree","DOM Tree","CSS Styling"],"acknowledgments":{"authors":["Anne Thyme Nørregaard","Bryn Anderson","Jey Nandakumar"]}}
